target_markets.market_description: Developers and designers using AI coding tools who want to create better-looking products
pain_points: Lack of design taste in AI outputs
Difficulty convincing stakeholders with poor design
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Thousands of users using V0, Lovable, Bolt tools

problems_validated.problem: AI creates generic content and designs that lack taste and uniqueness
problems_validated.severity: High - prevents users from charging more and gaining stakeholder trust
problems_validated.current_solutions: V0, Lovable, Bolt with basic templates
problems_validated.market_gap: Current solutions are developer-centric with very basic, generic templates that don't appeal to designers

products_tools.name: Aura
products_tools.use_case: Design-oriented prompt builder for AI coding tools with thousands of templates

products_tools.name: Sunday Reset
products_tools.use_case: AI-powered weekly reset tool that asks questions, learns patterns, and helps achieve goals

products_tools.name: Lovable
products_tools.use_case: AI coding platform more oriented toward designers

business_strategies.strategy: Charge more by creating better-designed products using advanced prompting techniques
business_strategies.implementation: Use design-focused prompting with proper context and taste
business_strategies.expected_results: Higher pricing, more stakeholder trust, competitive advantage
business_strategies.case_study: Speaker's products have over 150,000 lines of code each

problems_solutions.problem: AI coding tools produce generic, unattractive designs
problems_solutions.solution: Use advanced prompting with design context, typography, layout vocabulary, and visual references
steps: Learn design vocabulary (layout types, grid systems, framing)
Use proper color and styling context
Reference specific websites and design patterns
Build prompts with extensive context rather than starting from scratch

startup_ideas.idea: Sunday Reset - AI-powered weekly goal and habit tracking tool
startup_ideas.target_market: People wanting to achieve goals and build better habits
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Helps people stay on track with goals through AI-powered weekly check-ins

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Using generic prompts without design context when working with AI coding tools
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Results in generic, unattractive designs that don't convince stakeholders
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Invest time in learning design vocabulary and building detailed prompts with context
mistakes_to_avoid.example: 99% of results from basic prompting are very generic

growth_tactics.tactic: Create educational content about advanced AI prompting techniques

ai_workflows.workflow_name: Advanced Design Prompting for AI Coding Tools
steps: Set visual hierarchy and grid system
Build comprehensive prompt with all context
ai_workflows.use_case: Creating professional-looking designs from AI coding tools instead of generic outputs

metrics_kpis.benchmark: Moving from generic to unique, professional designs
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Add more design context and vocabulary to prompts

trends_signals.trend: Bento layout design pattern becoming mainstream
trends_signals.opportunity: Apple popularized it, others following - good to include in design vocabulary
Element-by-element animations rather than all-at-once fading

actionable_quotes.quote: You need to give a lot of context to AI and you need to train with taste
actionable_quotes.context: Discussing how to get better results from AI design tools
actionable_quotes.actionability: Invest time in building comprehensive, tasteful prompts rather than basic ones

actionable_quotes.context: Explaining why typography knowledge is crucial
actionable_quotes.actionability: Focus heavily on learning typography fundamentals for better AI design outputs

actionable_quotes.quote: Marketing is all about design, user experience, what people feel when they see your design
actionable_quotes.context: Explaining why design quality matters for business success
actionable_quotes.actionability: Prioritize design quality as a core marketing and business strategy

key_statistics.statistic: 99% of AI coding tool results are very generic
key_statistics.context: Discussing the current state of AI-generated designs
Explaining the importance of typography in design

key_statistics.statistic: Over 150,000 lines of code in each product
key_statistics.context: Speaker's experience with Aura and Dream Cut products

meta.title: How to get 10x more out of Lovable, Bolt, Cursor
